alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued June 26 at 1:52PM MST until June 26 at 3:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 300 PM MST. * At 152 PM MST, a wall of dust was along a line extending from 9 miles southwest of Gila Bend Auxiliary Field to near Big Horn to 13 miles southeast of Freeman, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Less than one mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 50 mph. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 107 and 162. AZ Route 238 between mile markers 1 and 31. AZ Route 85 between mile markers 1 and 17, and between mile markers 119 and 126. Locations impacted include... Gila Bend, Estrella, Freeman, Big Horn, Gila Bend Auxiliary Field, Bosque, Sonoran National Monument, Stanfield, Mobile and Ak- Chin Village. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
